QuestData.Title: Lost But Not Forgotten
QuestData.Description: Today marks the anniversary of my son Kron's passing. As long as I refused to admit it, I recognize now: Kron is not returning from his crocolisk hunt.$B$BI've been working on a project... something that will memorialize Kron's passion for the hunt. It's a crocolisk-tooth necklace... rows and rows of teeth, suitable to be worn by only the bravest young orc. I will place it on his grave.$b$bKron was brave, but he was not strong, like you. Will you bring me the teeth for my necklace?
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Beloved Kron, as he appeared in life.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $r. I will get to work on the necklace right away.$b$bBefore Kron died, I had made this for him to wear. I have no use for it now, but perhaps you might.
